abstract: Warren E. Buffett’s holding copmany Berkshire Hathaway Inc. agreed to expand its new bond insurer nationwide in exchange for faster licensing.
snippet: Warren E. Buffett’s holding copmany Berkshire Hathaway Inc. agreed to expand its new bond insurer nationwide in exchange for faster licensing.
lead_paragraph: Berkshire Hathaway Inc., the holding company for the billionaire investor Warren E. Buffett, agreed to expand its new bond insurer nationwide in exchange for faster licensing, a group of state regulators said Monday.

headline.main: Berkshire Hathaway to Expand Bond Insurer Nationwide
headline.print_headline: Berkshire Hathaway to Expand Bond Insurer Nationwide
